title: Lot of 11 T206's includes Pink Chase and Griffith Batting SOLD**
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: Lot of 11 T206's includes Pink Chase and Griffith Batting SOLD**
posts.post_content: I have the following lot of 11 T206's for sale.The lot price is $200 delivered. The lot includes a Pink Chase and a Griffith Batting. The Chase has paper loss and the Griffith has been deemed trimmed by PSA. The Griffith measures fine but has the wave on the top borders. Paypal and checks/mo accepted
